content.prompt: The phrase "a verbal life on the lips of the living" (Paragraph 1) suggests that

choices.label: performances live only in the memories of those who witness and speak of them
the reviews of critics have a powerful influence on the popularity of a production
dramatists try to write dialogue that imitates ordinary spoken language
audiences respond to the realism of the theater

skill.text: Skill 7.A: Explain how word choice, comparisons, and syntax contribute to the specific tone or style of a text.
